extendedInfo.description: CD Shelf - Track the CDs you own and the CDs you wantOrganise your library, scan CDs directly into your shelves.When you're in a shop, find out if you have a CD already, keep its Barcode or see it directly via the web.New to version 4.3.1** Mics fixes around bulk operations** More Connectivity checks* Organise your CDs into shelfs  - Online and offline help* Give your CDs:  - Star Ratings  - Release Date  - Series Name and Number (even allows numbers such as 1a or 1.5)  - Actors  - Studio  - Image  - Genre  - Description  - Characters  - Wanted / Owned / Read tags - with icons  - custom sequence number for sorting  - Color the title  - Add more custom fields or hide some main fields* Scan Barcodes  - supports continual scan and add, with adjustable focus interval  - automatically looks up info for scanned Barcodes's  - library mode scanning* Edit your details  - quick update fields in the list/grid view via multi select or the context menu  - shrink unused fields in the edit view  - track who you've loaned your CDs to* Home Screen  - Direct access to your favourite list - set any lsit as a favourite  - Can change your startup screen* Multiple views  - sort your shelves by title, series, author, date released and rating, sequence - per shelf  - view just CDs that are wanted, not owned or not read or any other tag  - view images in your list  - view CDs in a list or grid format - per shelf  - changable icons on the screens* Lookup information   - supports standard and in-depth searches, region order can be changed in settings  - control what level of internet connection is required for various searches  - both us and uk sources   - Lookup up all info on a shelf in one go  - Download missing images on a shelf in one go* View/Buy a CD via the internet  - search by actor, title or Barcode  - Scan a Barcode and then view directly on the internet  - type a CD title and search on the internet* Export and Import Shelves  - multiple export and import formats: csv, xml and txt (tab separated)  - export various fields from just Barcode to all fields (including custom fields)  - export directly to email  - files saved to/read from SD card for easy access  - import prevents duplicates (via Barcode), or allows them  - map file fields to your fields during import  - save anywhere requires a file system app such as 'File Manager' or 'Astro'* Search your CDs for any text field  - control which fields can be searched in settings  - fully integrated with quick search (will need enabling in global search options)* Share CD details with other applications  - directly to clipboard  - export to our database* Store an image for your book  - take a photo  - select an image from the web  - type a url for the image  * Many maintenance options, in the menus and in the settings  - set default values for common main fields  - add, rename, move, delete shelves and CDs* Customize the fields   - add other fields that you want  - hide the fields you don't want to see, including most pre-defined fields  - can be renamed or changed to take multiple values  - edit the values for a (lookup) field in one easy place, including delete, merge and rename  - clear a field of all values* Backup and restore  - full back up and restore to the sd card  - automatic backups  - restore settings and data seperately* SD Card Support  - move the application  - store the images on the SD card  - hide the images from the gallery viewerPermissions required:Full Internet - for information lookup (and ads)External Storage - for exports and importsCamera - for scanning BarcodesStart at Boot - for intialising auto backupPlease email all suggestions or queries (and problems) to dionhardy200@googlemail.com

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: WILL NOT READ THE WHOLE BAR CODES ON SOME CD\'S. UNISTALLED.
reviews.author: LEE WILLIAMS

reviews.title: Won\'t scan a single barcode
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried with several different CDs but it wasn\'t able to scan a single one of them. It just couldn\'t focus on them
reviews.author: Marcel de Groot

reviews.title: crap
reviews.comment: After updating, all the old records are gone. It took me a lot of time to build them.
reviews.author: Jessica Wu

reviews.title: incredible slow but does the basics
reviews.comment: slow search and save. should use GraceNote database. Need to use a stand alone barcode scanner app for best results. Good data, just painfully slow.
reviews.author: Fritz Lang

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great App. Everything work fine. Find almost every CDs i have ( some of my CDs don`t have scan-code, or they are very rare)
reviews.author: Krzysztof \305\273.

reviews.title: Excellent app + gets art & track lists
reviews.comment: Been looking for something like this for ages. Just wanted to scan, see the album covers, and get track lists without typing. And it can export for reassurance.
reviews.author: Paul Nicholson

reviews.title: Decent but I have a ?
reviews.comment: Is there a way to get all the album art in shot opposed to opening each one, hitting edit then saving ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks for the app
reviews.comment: Thanks for this simple yet really powerfull app.. Would\'ve given 5 stars had it allowed more customization..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Only a bit slow on scanning sometimes... focussing is not the best camera feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Camera will not focus
reviews.comment: I can\'t get it to scan.  The camera will not focus on the barcode so it does not scan them.
reviews.author: Kevin Nowak

reviews.title: I don\'t get it
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem to work. Scanned a bar code. Says CD already exists. But, it says 0 CDs. ? Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: easy, and fast
reviews.comment: Scanning 500 of my CDs only took me one hour - finding rate is about 90% (\'cause I have special weird CD) - Very good app to record CDs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Took some time to figure out
reviews.comment: Had trouble figuring out how to see cds. Would prefer edit screen to open after scanning to fill in info right away.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Thanks for making this app. I\'ve been using dvd shelf for almost a year & I love it. Im sure I\'ll love this one too
reviews.author: Scott C

reviews.title: Works but ugly.
reviews.comment: I\'d love to keep it if only it looked good too. Desperately need one but will have to consider Shelves or Home Library.
reviews.author: Francis Augustine

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Won\'t scan a single barcode. Uninstalling immediately.
reviews.author: Lindsey Kruger

reviews.title: Won\'t read barcose
reviews.comment: Scans barcode but I have to input the information manually. Might as well use pencil and paper.
reviews.author: Doc Scholl

reviews.title: Tricky to export
reviews.comment: Installed - played around with, uninstalled. Easy to add items - difficult to export contents.
reviews.author: A Google User
